title: Parker Kligerman
description:
Parker Kligerman (@pkligerman) is in the studio! This guy does everything: racing driver, pit reporter, TV host, and iRacing team owner. He has been the pit reporter for NBC Sports for several years, covering everything from NASCAR races to 24 Hour of Daytona. He currently drives the #75 truck in the NASAR Camping World Truck series and you can see him on "Proving Grounds" alongside out friends @lehmank and @thatsamsmith . 

 

Go to https://www.HelloFresh.com/smokingtire12 and use code smokingtire12 for 12 free meals, including free shipping!

 

Show Notes for Honey

Get Honey for FREE at https://www.JoinHoney.com/TIRE
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Parker Kligerman)
